hours_text:
# Hours + Admission

##### MUSEUM HOURS

Monday: **Closed**

Tuesday: **Closed**

Wednesday: 11:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.

Thursday: 11:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.

Friday: 11:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.

Saturday: 11:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.

Sunday: 11:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.

Every **Third Thursday** admission to Cascadia Art Museum is **FREE TO SEE all day through Art Walk Edmonds** , in memory of Gary Faigin.

##### ADMISSION

  * Adult: $15
  * Senior (65+): $10
  * Active Military: $10
  * Teacher (must show valid school ID): FREE!
  * Children and Students: FREE!
  * Group Rates**:** Adult Groups of 10 or more receive a discounted rate of $10 per person. To make a group reservation, [visit our Tours page.](https://www.cascadiaartmuseum.org/tours/)

##### HOLIDAY HOURS

**OPEN**

  * Easter Sunday
  * Friday after Thanksgiving

**CLOSED**

  * Thanksgiving Day
  * Christmas Day
  * New Year’s Day

collections_text:
**Feature Exhibition:**

[_Objects of the Elements: The Art of Elsa Thoresen_](https://www.cascadiaartmuseum.org/objects-of-the-elements-the-art-of-elsa-thoresen/)

**Feature Exhibition:**

[_Objects of the Elements: The Art of Elsa Thoresen_](https://www.cascadiaartmuseum.org/objects-of-the-elements-the-art-of-elsa-thoresen/)

# Who We Are

Cascadia Art Museum is an educational, nonprofit organization that celebrates the rich tradition of the visual arts and design in the Northwest during the period 1860-1970.

The museum provides enriching experiences for the community and visitors alike through original exhibitions, public programs, publications and educational outreach. Cascadia Art Museum seeks to reassess the hierarchy of Northwest art history by advancing the work of women, minority, and other artists who historically made substantial contributions to the region’s cultural identity. Cascadia believes that recognizing these hitherto neglected artists gives us a fuller and more comprehensive understanding of Northwest art history.

[Learn More](/who-we-are)

# Take a Virtual Tour

## JOIN

Become a member and take advantage of all the museum has to offer

[MEMBERSHIPS](https://www.cascadiaartmuseum.org/memberships/)

## VOLUNTEER

Our volunteers are the face of the museum and are increasingly important as we continue to grow

[VOLUNTEER](/newsite2022/volunteer)

## DONATE
